/home/burschka/XVision2-2.0.0/src/Devices/ieee1394-ioctl.h

00001 /* Base file for all ieee1394 ioctl's. Linux-1394 has allocated base '#'
00002  * with a range of 0x00-0x3f. */
00003 
00004 #ifndef __IEEE1394_IOCTL_H
00005 #define __IEEE1394_IOCTL_H
00006 
00007 #include <linux/ioctl.h>
00008 #include <linux/types.h>
00009 
00010 /* DV1394 Gets 10 */
00011 
00012 /* Get the driver ready to transmit video.  pass a struct dv1394_init* as
00013  * the parameter (see below), or NULL to get default parameters */
00014 #define DV1394_IOC_INIT            _IOW('#', 0x06, struct dv1394_init)
00015 
00016 /* Stop transmitting video and free the ringbuffer */
00017 #define DV1394_IOC_SHUTDOWN        _IO ('#', 0x07)
00018 
00019 /* Submit N new frames to be transmitted, where the index of the first new
00020  * frame is first_clear_buffer, and the index of the last new frame is
00021  * (first_clear_buffer + N) % n_frames */
00022 #define DV1394_IOC_SUBMIT_FRAMES   _IO ('#', 0x08)
00023 
00024 /* Block until N buffers are clear (pass N as the parameter) Because we
00025  * re-transmit the last frame on underrun, there will at most be n_frames
00026  * - 1 clear frames at any time */
00027 #define DV1394_IOC_WAIT_FRAMES          _IO ('#', 0x09)
00028 
00029 /* Capture new frames that have been received, where the index of the
00030  * first new frame is first_clear_buffer, and the index of the last new
00031  * frame is (first_clear_buffer + N) % n_frames */
00032 #define DV1394_IOC_RECEIVE_FRAMES  _IO ('#', 0x0a)
00033 
00034 /* Tell card to start receiving DMA */
00035 #define DV1394_IOC_START_RECEIVE   _IO ('#', 0x0b)
00036 
00037 /* Pass a struct dv1394_status* as the parameter */
00038 #define DV1394_IOC_GET_STATUS      _IOR('#', 0x0c, struct dv1394_status)
00039 
00040 
00041 /* Video1394 Gets 10 */
00042 
00043 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_LISTEN_CHANNEL         \
00044      _IOWR('#', 0x10, struct video1394_mmap)
00045 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_UNLISTEN_CHANNEL       \
00046      _IOW ('#', 0x11, int)
00047 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_LISTEN_QUEUE_BUFFER    \
00048      _IOW ('#', 0x12, struct video1394_wait)
00049 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_LISTEN_WAIT_BUFFER     \
00050      _IOWR('#', 0x13, struct video1394_wait)
00051 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_TALK_CHANNEL      \
00052      _IOWR('#', 0x14, struct video1394_mmap)
00053 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_UNTALK_CHANNEL         \
00054      _IOW ('#', 0x15, int)
00055 /*
00056  * This one is broken: it really wanted
00057  * "sizeof (struct video1394_wait) + sizeof (struct video1394_queue_variable)"
00058  * but got just a "size_t"
00059  */
00060 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_TALK_QUEUE_BUFFER      \
00061      _IOW ('#', 0x16, size_t)
00062 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_TALK_WAIT_BUFFER       \
00063      _IOW ('#', 0x17, struct video1394_wait)
00064 #define VIDEO1394_IOC_LISTEN_POLL_BUFFER     \
00065      _IOWR('#', 0x18, struct video1394_wait)
00066 
00067 
00068 /* Raw1394's ISO interface */
00069 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_XMIT_INIT       \
00070      _IOW ('#', 0x1a, struct raw1394_iso_status)
00071 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_INIT       \
00072      _IOWR('#', 0x1b, struct raw1394_iso_status)
00073 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_START      \
00074      _IOC (_IOC_WRITE, '#', 0x1c, sizeof(int) * 3)
00075 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_XMIT_START      \
00076      _IOC (_IOC_WRITE, '#', 0x1d, sizeof(int) * 2)
00077 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_XMIT_RECV_STOP       \
00078      _IO  ('#', 0x1e)
00079 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_GET_STATUS      \
00080      _IOR ('#', 0x1f, struct raw1394_iso_status)
00081 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_SHUTDOWN        \
00082      _IO  ('#', 0x20)
00083 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_QUEUE_ACTIVITY       \
00084      _IO  ('#', 0x21)
00085 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_LISTEN_CHANNEL  \
00086      _IOW ('#', 0x22, unsigned char)
00087 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_UNLISTEN_CHANNEL     \
00088      _IOW ('#', 0x23, unsigned char)
00089 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_SET_CHANNEL_MASK     \
00090      _IOW ('#', 0x24, __u64)
00091 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_PACKETS         \
00092      _IOW ('#', 0x25, struct raw1394_iso_packets)
00093 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_RELEASE_PACKETS \
00094      _IOW ('#', 0x26, unsigned int)
00095 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_XMIT_PACKETS         \
00096      _IOW ('#', 0x27, struct raw1394_iso_packets)
00097 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_XMIT_SYNC       \
00098      _IO  ('#', 0x28)
00099 #define RAW1394_IOC_ISO_RECV_FLUSH              \
00100      _IO  ('#', 0x29)
00101 
00102 
00103 #endif /* __IEEE1394_IOCTL_H */
